name: Anath
description:
Play as Anath, Canaan Godess of Love and War, who has to save her hostage brother Baal, the god of life and fertility from Mot, god of death.

This game is a submission to Brackey's game jam, where the theme is "Let There Be Chaos". We worked around this theme by having you equip up to 8 weapons at once, and watch Anath get chaotically propelled with each weapon's recoil, while fending off hordes of enemies in this Top Down shooter. Craft an arsenal of weapons, fight through a horde of enemies, and beat mot in the final epic battle of Chaos. Up for the challenge? Give this a try and leave us a rating when you're done!

 We hope you enjoy!

Yvan (Me), Dali (https://www.instagram.com/dalistrations/?hl=en ), Kerro (https://itch.io/profile/quantumgraphie ) ,  Ash (https://itch.io/profile/ashlit1998 ), Plato (https://itch.io/profile/rebelmodex ), and Mich (https://www.behance.net/mih24)
